item.title: gpustat: a rust-version of gpustat.
item.description: gpustat A rust version of gpustat. Just less than nvidia-smi? Usage $ gpustat Options: --color : Force colored output (even when stdout is not a tty) --no-color : Suppress colored output -u, --show-user : Display username of the process owner -c, --show-cmd : Display the process name -f, --show-full-cmd : Display full command and cpu stats of running process -p, --show-pid : Display PID of the process -F, --show-fan : Display GPU fan speed -e, --show-codec : Display encoder and/or decoder utilization -a, --show-all : Display all gpu properties above Quick Installation Install from Cargo:
